title: kaddhanuvaariki
sahitya:
kaddanuvAriki kaddu kaddani morala nIDu peddala mATalu nEDabaddhamaunO



anupallavi



addampu cekkillacE muddugAru mOmu jUDa buddhi galiginaTTi mA vadda

ravadEmirA



caraNam



niddura nirAkarinci mudduga tambura baTTi shuddhamaina manasucE susvaramutO

    baddu tappaka bhajiyincE bhakta pAlanamu sEyu taddaya shAlivi nIvE tyAgarAja

sannuta
